import React from "react"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { yupResolver } from "@hookform/resolvers/yup"; import * as yup from "yup"; import { StyledForm } from "./styles/Form.styled"; const schema = yup.object().shape({ receiverName: yup.string().required(), currentCode: yup.string().required(), delivery: yup.string().required(), deliveryCode: yup.string().required(), seller: yup.string().required(), bank: yup.string().required(), paymentMethod: yup.string().required(), invoice: yup.number().positive().required(), }); function Form() { const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors }, } = useForm({ resolver: yupResolver(schema), }); const submitForm = (data) => { console.log(data); }; return (

{errors.receiverName?.type === "required" && "Alıcı adı gerekli!"}

{errors.currentCode && "Cari kod gerekli!"}

{errors.deliveryCode && "Teslim için Özel Kod gerekli!"}

 ); } export default Form;
